events.text: [wave amp=50 freq=2]Where am I? Who am I?[/wave]
Welcome, stranger. You have fallen into the dark realm, a place between worlds. As for who you are, that is a question only you can answer.
You have lost your memories, and your identity is a mystery even to yourself.
How did I end up here?
That, too, is unknown. Perhaps you stumbled upon a portal or were cast here by a curse. But now that you are here, you must find a way to escape.
The dark realm is a dangerous place, full of creatures and traps that seek to ensnare you. Here is a Shadowist Dagger.
How can I escape if I don't even know who I am?
That is a question you must answer as you explore the realm. Seek out the artifacts scattered throughout the land, and perhaps they will unlock the memories hidden within you.
But beware - you are not the only one seeking these artifacts, and there are those who will stop at nothing to claim them.
I will do what I must to escape this place and reclaim my identity.
The path ahead is treacherous, but I sense a strength within you. May it guide you on your journey.
Remember, stranger - the fate of the dark realm, and perhaps even your own, rests in your hands.
